radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver appears normal in echotexture. There are innumerable echogenically shadowing stones within the gallbladder and the lumen is not visualized. The gallbladder is not distended. There is no wall thickening or pericholecystic fluid. The CBD is enlarged at 9 mm although no stones are seen within the CBD. There is no intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation. There is normal hepatopetal flow in the main portal vein.
